title: View logs for a registered collector

blocks.content:
When you visit the Grafana Fleet Management interface in Grafana Cloud after registering a collector, a `self_monitoring_logs_*` configuration pipeline is automatically created and assigned based on the collector's operating system.
This pipeline collects internal logs.
In your Grafana Cloud stack, click **Connections** > **Collector** > **Fleet Management**.
Search, filter, or sort to find the unhealthy collector in your **Inventory**.
Click on the collector to open the details view drawer and switch to the **Logs** tab.

To interpret the logs, refer to [Internal logs](https://grafana.com/docs/grafana-cloud/send-data/fleet-management/manage-fleet/collectors/troubleshoot-unhealthy-collector/internal-logs/#error-level-logs)
